roleset.name: application of pressure

example.name: just arg0
example.text: tight supplies next spring could leave the wheat futures market susceptible to a supply - demand squeeze

example.name: arg1
example.text: many of China 's big infrastructural projects have been canceled or postponed because of the squeeze on domestic and foreign credit .

example.name: args 0 and 1
example.text: ... his look and his squeeze of his hand told that he knew his acquaintances and what they said to him.

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on squeeze-v.01. Corresponds to VNcls knead-26.5, touch-20-1, wipe_manner-10.4.1.
